EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q416.Reminder - New York
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud-Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in New York. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow—New York, NY Tuesday, November 22, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/newyork]]>
Location: Pivotal New York <[[https://pivotal.io/locations/newyork]]> 625 Avenue of the Americas Second Floor New York, NY 10011 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal/@40.740284,-73.9972663,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89c259bccd2dfbab:0xad7f9c23ffc3e702!8m2!3d40.74028!4d-73.995083]]>
Parking information: Public transportation recommended
Questions? Contact Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[emailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
